item.title: Understanding JavaScript's Event Loop, Asynchronous Operations and Concurrency
item.description: JavaScript is single-threaded in the sense that its execution environment (the JavaScript runtime) operates in a single-threaded model.

item.title: Understanding Virtual DOM: A Simple Implementation Guide
item.description: In modern web development, efficient rendering is crucial for creating responsive applications. One of the most popular approaches to improving performance is the Virtual DOM.
